pageContext.claim: “They stole two elections, not one. I've seen people where an election got stolen, and by the way, we're not gonna let that happen to us, you know, with these ballots.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump without evidence claims the Democrats stole victory fro Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt) -- who clearly was Trump's preferred opponent -- and then baselessly suggests the Democrats will also steal the presidential election.
